document_data.name: ''Veiled Tears''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Veiled Tears''''' was an infamous [[enchanted]] [[greatsword]] of [[elven]] make.
document_data.History: The ''Veiled Tears'' was created sometime before [[1372 DR]] by an elven master smith named [[Quilin]]. Subsequently, the powerful enchanted sword gained a negative reputation. With time, a lesser cousin of the ''Veiled Tears'' was created by one of Quilin's apprentices for mistress [[Lissial‎]]. That sword was originally named the ''[[Gentle Rain‎]]''.
